name: error
searchIndex: error Utilities for handling errors ['error'] ERRORSTR Converts an error into a string. Note that this does not include the error toast dialogue, only the literal string representation of the error (e.g. "#N/A"). THROW Throws a #REF! error with a custom message.

ERRORSTR.description: Converts an error into a string. Note that this does not include the error toast dialogue, only the literal string representation of the error (e.g. "#N/A").

THROW.description: Throws a #REF! error with a custom message.

message.description: The message to add to the error.
